chara.textHome:
You'll get to know me as we go along.
That is all.
Hm? That's not sufficient?

Let's see... I don't have any hobbies.
My favorite words are
"fairness" and "equality".

I might seem uptight,
but I'm trying to be kind and sisterly.

Also, I used to fight against Yachiyo and
Mifuyu as a leader of the East.
That's it, I suppose.
A photograph?

I get paid extra for those,
so I'd be happy to take one with you.

But I know a lot of people in this city,
so I insist I wear a mask.

I now have new powers to fight
for justice and fairness.
I feel like I've matured.
Maybe I'll hunt a Witch on my way home.

As a Magical Girl,
I'm often put in leadership roles,
but I don't mind getting asked for help.

I'm happy to be useful for more than
just hunting Witches.
Magical Girls are equal in their destinies.

No matter where they were born,
they shoulder the same burden
the moment they become Magical Girls.

I'm happy I'm improving, because
that means I can help
protect my fellow Magical Girls.
Hello, Master!

Hm, perhaps my greeting could
use some work.

Sorry, you just got here and I started
practicing my maid cafe greetings
right off the bat.

Tsuruno inspired me to devise my own
morning stretch routine.

Care to watch?
Let's start the Kanagi Izumi
Morning Stretches!
First extend your arm...and start whipping!

I'm afraid I must decline your
lunch invitation.

I make my own lunch.
Working with limited ingredients is
fun for me...
Would you like a bite?

The cafe gets busy around this time,
and the customers occasionally
gift me with candies.

I keep them as dessert for dinner
with my family.

In the quiet, late hours, my thoughts turn to
when Mitama became a Magical Girl.

I never would've imagined
she felt the same way I did...

The influx of Witches appears to have
fostered peace in the
Magical Girl community.

There were endless disputes over territory
before... Now, there are no borders.
I can tell what you want to ask.
You wish to go hunt Witches, correct?
Wait a moment so I can call my boss first.

I have a long history with the Mirror Witch,
but I can never reach the Witch itself.

Even when I try to read its minions' minds,
their chatter makes no sense to me...
Irrationality, ingratitude, injustice...

These are all my sworn enemies.
I will correct those who blithely commit
such crimes, without question.
Do I like my hometown?
I do.

My parents were born and fell in love here,
and then I was born and raised here in turn.

It may be a rough area,
but it's important to me.
Hm, what a shame...

If I'd known we were doing PE in class,
I would have come in my gym uniform.

I still recall the image of my father's back
as he toiled at the ironworks...
Working adults are so cool.

It inspires me to keep working hard
at my jobs.

Comparing Tsukasa and Tsukuyo
feels strange to me.

They're identical, and yet their busts
have such different measurements...
The human body is an enigma.

Yachiyo, Mifuyu, and I have had many
a conflict, but we usually came to a
resolution once we talked things out.

Looking back, I think our way of thinking
was pretty similar.
Could you explain my niche for me?

People keep throwing phrases at me like
"cool and kind," "obsessive romantic," and
"hot and cold," but I don't really understand.
You'd be helping my studies.
History is a meddlesome thing.

No matter how much people or places may
change, it claws at their heels and tries to
drag them back into the past like a specter...
It breaks my heart.
Ha, so you're that desperate for my attention.

Keep bothering me and I'll
read your mind and expose
all your deepest darkest secrets...
No, I'm only kidding.
I fight for the East!
I suppose that could've been worse.
My boss is calling, I need to hurry to work!

Life and death are granted to us
in equal measure.
Curse your own actions, then atone for them.
Are you the one asking me for help?

Let me look into your mind to see
if your intentions are true.
Yes, things are looking good.

This means I can crack my whip
much more furiously.

I took care of Mitama in the past,
but now she's always taking care of me.

For every chapter of my story you hear,
I shall read your mind.
Are you all right with that?
Be yummy. Be yummy.
Does saying that really make it taste better?

Hm.
I'll have to try it next time a master visits.

You want to play a game with me as a maid?
Interesting.
How about arm wrestling?
Some exercise would do you good.
